text: The Croix de guerre 1939–1945 (War Cross 1939–1945) is a French military decoration, a version of the Croix de guerre created on September 26, 1939. It honors people who fought with the Allies against the Axis forces at any time during World War II. ==References== Category:Military honors Category:Military of France
title: Croix de Guerre 1939–1945
